marklogic.body:
This is what has happened to Obamacare. A well thought out scheme is promoted democratically over a period of two to three years. But the opposition, not accepting the norms of true democracy and enforcing its extensions, refused to accept it and kept on agitating against it. The freely available media, which Depends on creating controversy which increases its viewership and thus revenue, used its own definition of the extended meaning of democracy, kept the flames of controversy Burning and here we are almost in square one after about four years.
This is not going to be the end. We can expect this to continue for several years till our nation is really doomed. Is the preservation of party rule so sacrosanct that national interests have become secondary? Have we all become so blind that we are for war one day and peace the next day; for increasing taxes one day and just the opposite the next day; for stricter regulations today and for abolition of any control tomorrow. When we flip flop so much as a nation, why blame Romney for swaying to the wind?
This is not going to last much longer. When words fail, when reasonableness is ignored, when justice is denied with impunity, when the system is aborted, people revolt. I am waiting for that day. Because, if nothing else, democracy has taught us how to successfully agitate and get our reasonable demands conceded. We may be delayed, but we cannot be stopped. nirmala@sify.com
